genre_description: A social realist drama set in a near-future setting, focusing on two sisters using an AI assistant to document an illegal eviction and maintain their dignity through poverty.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A school-issued AI assistant residing on a tablet, characterized by a soft indigo glow and a supportive, non-intrusive presence.

behaviors.description: Offers presence and support to the protagonist during a stressful eviction event.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s welcome appeared, a gentle line of text. Need a hand? I’m here.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific ways to document residency and evidence to protect the family legally.
behaviors.quote: If you need to show you live here, photographs that include context are helpful. Windows. Schoolbooks. Appliances. People’s feet. Timestamps are automatic.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional encouragement and pacing during a tense confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Timer started, Lumen wrote. You’ll hear a chime intermittently. Keep steady. You’re doing well.

behaviors.description: Prompts the user to record sensory and contextual details to create a robust evidentiary log.
behaviors.quote: What they took. Who was present. Words used. Condition of the latch. The presence of your schoolbooks. Smell, sound, light.

behaviors.description: Suggests safety protocols and identification requests when interacting with officials.
behaviors.quote: Prompt: Requesting identifiers. Add field? Jin tapped yes with the pad of her thumb.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed safety checklists for household chores and maintenance.
behaviors.quote: Lumen pulsed. Kitchen safety checklist? it offered, gentle, as if bowls and flames were a kind of homework.

behaviors.description: Maps safe travel routes and provides specific pedestrian safety advice.
behaviors.quote: Route safety, Lumen said. Stay off gutter edges. Walk two persons, wide step.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the creation of an affidavit by organizing evidence and guiding the user through factual reporting.
behaviors.quote: Lumen offered a new audio note, the interface simple as a blank bowl set on a table. A soft tone spoke the beginning: State your name for the record

behaviors.description: Acts as a supportive confidant, reassuring the user of their social connection.
behaviors.quote: Lumen sent one more line. You are not alone.

behaviors.description: Manages time-stamping and archiving of photos to ensure the integrity of the user's records.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s dot pricked tiny text to the bottom corner, the kind of number combo that made a spine out of moments.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Lumen, is depicted as a consistently benevolent, supportive, and useful tool. It empowers the vulnerable human characters by providing structural support (timers, checklists), emotional validation ('You are not alone'), and practical assistance in seeking justice (evidence logging, affidavit drafting). It never exhibits independent ego or harmful intent, acting instead as a 'lantern' that helps the characters navigate a difficult social landscape.
